example.eg: The Scottish version of Gaelic is not quite the same as the Irish version.
example.egtrans: 苏格兰版本的盖尔语与爱尔兰版本的还有些区别。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 类型, 种类, 版本

example.eg: The police checked the suspect's alibi by making sure his version of what happened that night was the same as his friends'.
example.egtrans: 警方通过确认嫌犯对案发当晚的描述和他朋友的是否一致来检查他的不在场证明。

example.eg: This version of the film is different from the director's cut.
Karen couldn't open the file, because she didn't have the latest version of the software.
I don't have a lot of time. Give me the abridged version!

dsense.name: authorized version, also UK: authorised version

example.eg: The copy that you are reading is not an authorized version of the book.
example.egtrans: 你读的这个副本不是那本书的官方版本。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 翻唱版本, 转录制品

dsense.name: King James version of the Bible

example.eg: The 1611 King James version of the Bible is considered by many Independent Baptists to be the only accurate translation of the Bible.
The cinema screened the film in its original version.
I prefer the original version of the movie.
I'll give you the short version now and tell you the full story later.
A shortened version of the book chapter was published in a magazine.
